events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but it does not fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a request for returning a product and obtaining money back, so the issue is categorized under Refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Julia Smith who specializes in refund requests.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to return your jacket. Iâ€™m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is still new, unworn, and I kept it exactly as it was when delivered.
Thank you for the info. Please use the prepaid shipping label we will send to your email to return the jacket, and once we receive it, we will issue a full refund to your original payment method.
That sounds great! I appreciate the quick help and the prepaid label makes it very convenient. I will send it back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your return experience.
Yes, I received my refund today and everything went smoothly. Thanks again for your support!
We are glad to hear you are satisfied. Closing this refund case now. Please contact us any time if you need further assistance.
